g.text: API Design/UI design during this phase
using AWS services according to API Design
Once the feature is tested and ready
ship behind a BETA feature toggle
Optional: Add userflow to guide users
Not optional: Organise a launch party 🎉

g.id: link_start_RFC Phase

path.id: start-to-RFC Phase

g.id: link_RFC Phase_RFC

path.id: RFC Phase-to-RFC

g.id: link_RFC_Describe High-Level Problem Context\nWith Proposed solution

path.id: RFC-to-Describe High-Level Problem Context\nWith Proposed solution

g.id: link_Describe High-Level Problem Context\nWith Proposed solution_MOCK

path.id: Describe High-Level Problem Context\nWith Proposed solution-to-MOCK

g.id: link_RFC_Include concrete API Designs\ne.g: OpenAPI with a PR

path.id: RFC-to-Include concrete API Designs\ne.g: OpenAPI with a PR

g.id: link_Include concrete API Designs\ne.g: OpenAPI with a PR_MOCK

path.id: Include concrete API Designs\ne.g: OpenAPI with a PR-to-MOCK

g.id: link_MOCK_API Mocking

path.id: MOCK-to-API Mocking

g.id: link_API Mocking_Use serverless boilerplate to\ndeploy mocked version of API\n(w/ openapi-backend)

path.id: API Mocking-to-Use serverless boilerplate to\ndeploy mocked version of API\n(w/ openapi-backend)

g.id: link_Use serverless boilerplate to\ndeploy mocked version of API\n(w/ openapi-backend)_FE

path.id: Use serverless boilerplate to\ndeploy mocked version of API\n(w/ openapi-backend)-to-FE

g.id: link_API Mocking_Generate SDK API client\npart of the boilerplate\n(w/ openapi-client-axios)

path.id: API Mocking-to-Generate SDK API client\npart of the boilerplate\n(w/ openapi-client-axios)

g.id: link_Generate SDK API client\npart of the boilerplate\n(w/ openapi-client-axios)_FE

path.id: Generate SDK API client\npart of the boilerplate\n(w/ openapi-client-axios)-to-FE

g.id: link_FE_Frontend Development

path.id: FE-to-Frontend Development

g.id: link_Frontend Development_Use create-mfe-app boilerplate\nto deploy microfrontend

path.id: Frontend Development-to-Use create-mfe-app boilerplate\nto deploy microfrontend

g.id: link_Use create-mfe-app boilerplate\nto deploy microfrontend_Add feature toggle to\nhide feature in production

path.id: Use create-mfe-app boilerplate\nto deploy microfrontend-to-Add feature toggle to\nhide feature in production

g.id: link_Add feature toggle to\nhide feature in production_Develop microfrontend against\nmocked API contract

path.id: Add feature toggle to\nhide feature in production-to-Develop microfrontend against\nmocked API contract

g.id: link_Develop microfrontend against\nmocked API contract_Still cheap to rapidly change\nAPI Design/UI design during this phase

path.id: Develop microfrontend against\nmocked API contract-to-Still cheap to rapidly change\nAPI Design/UI design during this phase

g.id: link_Still cheap to rapidly change\nAPI Design/UI design during this phase_Backend Development

path.id: Still cheap to rapidly change\nAPI Design/UI design during this phase-to-Backend Development

g.id: link_Backend Development_Implement serverless backend\nusing AWS services according to API Design

path.id: Backend Development-to-Implement serverless backend\nusing AWS services according to API Design

g.id: link_Implement serverless backend\nusing AWS services according to API Design_BETA Release

path.id: Implement serverless backend\nusing AWS services according to API Design-to-BETA Release

g.id: link_BETA Release_Once the feature is tested and ready\nfor internal/pilot customers to test\nship behind a BETA feature toggle

path.id: BETA Release-to-Once the feature is tested and ready\nfor internal/pilot customers to test\nship behind a BETA feature toggle

g.id: link_Once the feature is tested and ready\nfor internal/pilot customers to test\nship behind a BETA feature toggle_Full Release

path.id: Once the feature is tested and ready\nfor internal/pilot customers to test\nship behind a BETA feature toggle-to-Full Release

g.id: link_Full Release_Remove BETA badge from toggle

path.id: Full Release-to-Remove BETA badge from toggle

g.id: link_Remove BETA badge from toggle_Marketing announces new feature

path.id: Remove BETA badge from toggle-to-Marketing announces new feature

g.id: link_Marketing announces new feature_Optional: Add userflow to guide users

path.id: Marketing announces new feature-to-Optional: Add userflow to guide users

g.id: link_Optional: Add userflow to guide users_Not optional: Organise a launch party 🎉

path.id: Optional: Add userflow to guide users-to-Not optional: Organise a launch party 🎉

g.id: link_Not optional: Organise a launch party 🎉_end

path.id: Not optional: Organise a launch party 🎉-to-end
